title: Count of threads related to an entity
description: This schema defines the type for reporting the count of threads related to an entity.

conversationCount.description: Total count of all the threads of type Conversation.

openTaskCount.description: Total count of all the open tasks.

closedTaskCount.description: Total count of all the tasks.

totalTaskCount.description: Total count of all the tasks.

mentionCount.description: Total count of all the mentions of a user.

totalAnnouncementCount.description: Total count of all the announcements associated with the entity.

activeAnnouncementCount.description: Total count of all the active announcements associated with the entity.

inactiveAnnouncementCount.description: Total count of all the inactive announcements associated with the entity.
